name: Removal of the Temple Bar
obverse: The eastern side of the Temple Bar with gates closed.
obverse_inscriptions: TEMPLE BAR: ERECTED 1672, DEMOLISHED 1878; THIS EFFIGY OF IT WAS STRUCK FROM THE LEAD FORMERLY THE ROOF.
description: This medal is made of lead and is enclosed in a glass paper weight.
There are no exact mintage numbers but it claimed to be the rarest of the City of London series.
